mapper.update: update post set postinquiry = postinquiry+1 where postcode = #{postCode}
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select lpad(' ',(level-1)*4,'>')||postname as title ,post.* from post start with postrefer is null connect by prior postcode = postrefer order siblings by postrefer asc ,postcode desc )a where boardcode = #{boardCode} and postavailable = 1 ) where rnum between #{pageNumber}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) and #{pageNumber}*#{pageSize}
